title: Benihana serves lunch menu with teppanyaki and sushi options
statement: Benihana offers a lunch menu featuring teppanyaki grilled items like hibachi steak, chicken, shrimp, scallops, as well as sushi combinations and poke bowls.

citations.quote: At Benihana, it's not just a meal, it's an experience. Enjoy teppanyaki favorites like Hibachi Steak, Chicken and Shrimp, as well as sushi and sashimi.
